utter.translation[0].definitions[0].defi: complete – used especially to emphasize that something is very bad, or that a feeling is very strong
utter.translation[0].definitions[0].exam: This company treats its employees with utter contempt.
I watched in complete and utter horror as he pulled out a gun.
utter.translation[1].definitions[0].exam: Cantor nodded without uttering a word.
utter.translation[1].definitions[1].defi: to make a sound with your voice, especially with difficulty
utter.translation[1].definitions[1].exam: The wounded prisoner uttered a groan.
